mapper.update: update technology.enterprise_information set e_name = #{eName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, e_category = #{eCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, e_code = #{eCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, e_date = #{eDate,jdbcType=DATE}, taxpayer_Type = #{taxpayerType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, e_fund = #{eFund,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, e_product = #{eProduct,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_name = #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where e_Id = #{eId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select e_Id, e_name, e_category, e_code, e_date, taxpayer_Type, e_fund, e_product, file_name from technology.enterprise_information where e_Id = #{eId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select e_Id, e_name, e_category, e_code, e_date, taxpayer_Type, e_fund, e_product, file_name from technology.enterprise_information
